entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 27.
